description: Ready to create a resume? Monster's resume examples can help. Search by industry or job title for a professional resume that will inspire you to write your own.

header: Action Verbs Can Power Your Resume
contributor: By Caroline Zaayer Kaufman, Monster contributor
description: Action verbs on your resume can show companies all the awesome things you've done--and what you can do for them if given a chance.

contributor: The 10 Worst Resume Mistakes to Avoid
description: By Peter Vogt, Monster contributor Whether you're writing your first resume or tenth, no one is immune from making a mistake or two. Check our list of common resume mistakes to avoid.
